## Load() function

Fetches the JavaScript component of the hand tracking API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Load(sdkUrl?: string): Promise<IHandTrackingApi>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sdkUrl | string | (Optional) Overwrites the default URL from which the API is loaded. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[IHandTrackingApi](./yoha.ihandtrackingapi.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise that resolves with the handtracking API.
